Maybe if the top was looser, the bra would not have been as noticeable. Tried a white cami underneath, but that was visibly worse than the nude bra. I purchased this for family photos on the beach and did not have time to shop for a nude cami.  That probably would work. Other than these issues, I really liked the top.  It's also important to note, that it is not pure white, but rather an off-white.

This is a nice shirt and the weight is heavy enough that it's not see through.  ***update It is just the light pink color that is sized incorrectly. The large fits like the medium does in two other colors. If you would normally wear a medium order the large in the light pink. Keep with the medium if you order the light blue or green. Those are the other colors I tried.

I am top heavy and I was worried about the fabric not fitting well so I ordered a size up and I had to return it and order the correct size because the fit is great. Lovely fabric and great quality for the price. I would absolutely order this again in other colors.

评论概述: It is huge under the arms, and has perm creases in the fabric
评论详情: I received this top today. I cut the label out of the neck because I am very sensitive to them. I laundered it, and discover there are permanent creases running horizontal in two places. I can't see anyway to get these flaws out of the fabric. I am disappointed! I am also mad at myself for not checking over the merchandise before I laundered it & cut out the tag. The colors are true to the photos, they are comfortable and super easy to iron, made of a breezy lightweight fabric that goes really nicely under jackets or looks great by itself too. Big fan of these shirts and plan on buying more colors.
Love the color, the fit and the design.
Looks great and I ordered a medium, but it was too tight in the bust area. Going to try a large.

For reference I am wearing a large, I am 5’6 and around 180 right now. It falls nicely and is great by itself or under a blazer for work or sweater. It’s a nice thicker material. As you can see it does wrinkle, but I had it tucked it all day. It’s a little see through, but what white top isn’t at lease a little. I love this to add to my work wardrobe and even dress it down. definitely recommend!

I really wanted to like this shirt, but ultimately I don't. It arrived with some damage to the material on the upper right shoulder, and when I tried it on I found it to be rather shapeless. It would really benefit from some darts at the bust and being taken in at the waist. Without darts, the armholes form rather unattractive gaps that would give anyone standing next to you a great view of your bra. If you're planning to wear it under a cardigan or a blazer these fit issues are less problematic, but I'd still rather have something that fit better to begin with. There were also a number of long threads hanging off that needed to be trimmed short. The bust, shoulder, and length measurements did all measure true to the size chart.

I got this shirt for work, and was confused about the sizing, since the smallest size was a medium. I can confirm that a medium fits more like a generously sized small, which means that it was my size. The fabric is nice, and the green color is really pretty in real life. It washes and wears well. It's a nice, comfortable top.

It was a snug fit (36D) and normally a medium/large. Purchased large. It was a snug fit across the chest, but there was enough stretch that it didn’t look too tight. I think sizing up would have been sloppy. Wore with a blazer and it looked professional and clean.

This shirt is cute i thought it would be a true orange but it’s more of a darker orange. The shirt itself is cute. It came super fast and packaged well. It did not have any blemishes or holes.

评论概述: Chic & versatile- elegant tank for office or home
评论详情: I ordered this tank in light pink, which seems more like a dusty rose. It's 100% polyester, sleeveless, and is made with high quality. The pleats at the front elevate it from a simple top to one of class and sophistication. I chose a medium size, and it fits comfortably, it's a relaxed silhouette that drapes well without clinging to the body. After wearing it all day at work, I can definitely attest to its comfort and lightness. The care instructions suggest a gentle wash in cold water and laying it flat to dry. However, I prefer to dry clean items I'm especially fond of, like this shirt, to maintain their condition over time. This has the added benefit of preserving the pleats and overall shape of the top. Versatility- best feature- it both complements my office wear by adding a professional touch to my ensemble and easily transitions into casual wear by pairing it with a comfy pair of jeans. This top is a relaxed, chic, and versatile choice that easily adapts to both business and leisure without compromising on elegance.

Slower shipping. Sizing is accurate and fits as expected. Arm holes aren't too tight and length is good. Fabric wears and washes well. Color is as expected. Flattering design. Great for casual wear or business dress and pairs great with a blazer.

This is a very nice top. I ordered this in orange. I love the color. It is sleeveless with pleated V neck. It comes in 8 colors and is machine washable. It has a semi dressy look and is very feminine.

The pleats ! The v neck ! The heavy, gorgeous fabric ! What a fabulous shirt ! It also provides full coverage in the front and back. The white is a little see through, so you might want a camisole. I am  sure this won't be an issue with all the other colors. A great price for a shirt that will be worn to work a lot !

I got this to wear under a jacket or cardigan for work. It is cute, comfortable, and fits true to size. It has a little bit of stretch, which is nice. It is well made and not sheer or see through. I like the pink color, as it is not to bright/bubblegum pink, nor a light pastel, but somewhere in between. Very happy with this top.

评论概述: Tremendously good quality for the price!
评论详情: I'm an OG fashionista and daughter of an amateur couture seamstress. This top is AH-MAAAZ-ING. - It's a very good polyester crepe georgette, which drapes beautifully and is not see-through. - The garment is extremely well made for the price: stitches are fairly small (they could be smaller but oh well), collar is properly cut and attached, pleats are well executed. - VERY IMPORTANT: Arm holes are cut high enough to hide underarm flab! Yay! - The top fits true to size and is, more importantly, true to vendor's size chart. (It's crucial to take your measurements and use those for sizing clothing online. Ain't no other way to get it right, girlies!) - I give it a 10 point deduction (but do understand) for not having darts at the bust, which would have ensured a truly perfect fit. But darts are expensive, so oh well again. - The white is beautiful and perfect for wearing under suit jackets and blazers at work. This is one you want in every color. I'm so impressed I actually followed the vendor to see what else they make that's cute!
La blusa es de excelente calidad, el color me encantó, compré talla M, me quedó perfecta, le puse 4 estrellas por que lo único que le veo es que es un poco larga, sería excelente que fuera más corta.
Calidad muy linda. Color exacto a descripcion.
